title: LF Jungler/Top Laner
body:
Hey! Currently looking for a jungler/top laner for the team we have created.

Looking for someone with strong presence and a dominant jungler who can shot call effectively

Looking for high plat +

Just leave your details below in this format, don't add me in game as i wont be active for another week.

IGN
AGE
Days Available 
Champion Pool
Season you started

Thank you :D
